name: BW Tetris
description:
A Global GameJam Game made in 48 hours!

Match the same color of one row to Destroy blocks!

Controls:
GamePad:
LScroll/DPad to move
LScroll Up/DPad Up to Drop instantly
A Button to Rotate Clockwise
B Button to Rotate Reversed Clockwise
LB Button to Paint every top block of a column to White.(Cooldown Time at left-down corner)
RB Button to Paint every top block of a column to Black.(Cooldown Time at right-down corner)

Keyboard:
Arrow keys to move
Up Arrow key to Drop instantly
X key to Rotate Clockwise
Z key to Rotate Reversed Clockwise
A key to Paint every top block of a column to White(Cooldown Time at left-down corner).
S key to Paint every top block of a column to Black(Cooldown Time at right-down corner).
